${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:TheLastWish.NAME: The Last Wish
${modID}:TheLastWish.FLAVOR: You've always landed on your feet... what could go wrong?
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 9 times you take damage, you are healed for 20% of your Max HP and add a random #yDeath #yCurse to your deck.

${modID}:EldersEye.NAME: Elder's Eye
${modID}:EldersEye.FLAVOR: Memories of distant ancestors seem to be imploring you to stop being so reckless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with 1 #y${modID}:Caution. At the start of your turn, gain 1 #y${modID}:Caution.

${modID}:AncestralCall.NAME: Ancestral Call
${modID}:AncestralCall.FLAVOR: In the heat of battle, the rush of blood in your ears sounds like music.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yStrength, gain an equal amount of #y${modID}:Lion's_Heart.

${modID}:TotemOfLife.NAME: Totem of Life
${modID}:TotemOfLife.FLAVOR: Someone once told you pain was temporary, or was that a dream?
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Every 9 times you take damage, you are healed for 20% of your Max HP, add a random #yDeath #yCurse to your deck, and gain 1 #yIntangible.
